name: Build and Test with Pull Request Build

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: windows-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: Set up MSBuild
      uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.3.1

    # 🔹 NuGet 패키지 복원 (필요한 경우)
    - name: Restore NuGet packages
      run: nuget restore SSDSimulator.sln

    # ✅ DEBUG 빌드
    - name: Build Debug
      run: msbuild SSDSimulator.sln /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64

    - name: Run Debug Tests
      run: |
        cd x64/Debug
        SSDSimulatorTests.exe --gtest_output=xml:test-results-debug.xml

    # ✅ RELEASE 빌드
    - name: Build Release
      run: msbuild SSDSimulator.sln /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64

    - name: Run Release Tests
      run: |
        cd x64/Release
        SSDSimulatorTests.exe --gtest_output=xml:test-results-release.xml

    # 📤 테스트 결과 업로드 (Debug/Release 모두)
    - name: Upload Debug Test Results
      if: always()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: test-results-debug
        path: x64/Debug/test-results-debug.xml

    - name: Upload Release Test Results
      if: always()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: test-results-release
        path: x64/Release/test-results-release.xml
